entry.data:
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS AROUND 50
